review:
some say ms dhoni: the untold story (2016) is the best cricket film.
some say iqbal (2005) is the best cricket film.
but deep down we all know victory is the best cricket film...
this is heart touching movie belongs to a cricketer love this movie and wanna see again and again
a good sportish movie i think everybody can watch it if they love sport
fantastic movie but its a real story or a reel story...please inform me

bgm was not good
however this was a huge disappointment
